changelog: Feature: Trakt API integration for trending content (most anticipated and most watched series/movies)
Feature: Dark mode toggle for email templates (enabled by default)
Feature: Light mode option for users who prefer traditional white backgrounds

Enhancement: Conditional email template sections based on feature toggles
